pr_title: Add FindBugs and make fixes to make it happy

timeline.message: Add findbugs and make fixes to make it happy. Removed unused classes which had lots of errors

timeline.author: leaf94

timeline.bodyText: Was this added because of some findbug failure?
timeline.author: leaf94

replies.bodyText: Yes, FindBugs checks that any class loader occur within a privileged context.
replies.author: MikeDombo
